comments:
Any attempt to run an ant build file or use the ant view fails with the error
"unable to load class needed to parse".  I'm seeing this problem using the MacOS
X verison of Eclipse, but I have no reason to suspect it is platform specific.

Wilhelm, are you running eclipse on a 1.3.* VM or a 1.4.* VM?

I do not believe that the stack trace is causing the problem (though it is 
still incorrect see bug 32787). 

Rather we have experienced a Xerces class loading problem with our classloader 
(required for parsing the build file). See bug 33117.

The exception that is causing the problem:

Turns out there is a Ant type that will only be loaded if you are running 
using a 1.4.1 VM (XMLCatalog).

Our InternalProject was failing on this...the Apache Ant Project ignores any 
load failures.

Fixed in InternalProject.
As well, AntRunner now sets the context classloader when retrieving targets to 
be consistent.
Please verify DarinW.
*** Bug 33565 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
